definition: to organize/to host (a conference or sports event)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with
the right to host (an international meeting)

sentences.english: The applicants who pass the qualification pre-evaluation will receive the formal invitation for Levy.
sentences.chinese: 主辦單位向資審合格的應徵人發出正式邀請。

sentences.english: Expo 010 is organized by Chinese Government, and operated by the city of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海世博會由中國政府主辦上海市承辦。

sentences.english: I want to thank Tom and the Chamber and all of the sponsors for hosting this dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我要感謝湯姆和美國商會以及晚餐會的所有主辦方。

sentences.english: The organizer will not pay the design cost of disqualified design schemes.
sentences.chinese: 無效成果文件的設計機構，主辦方將不予支付成本費。

sentences.english: Two copies of each entry should be submitted.
sentences.chinese: 每件參賽作品需提交兩套作品予主辦機構。

sentences.english: Pyeongchang in South Korea will host the 2018 Winter Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 韓國的平昌將主辦2018年冬季奧運會。

sentences.english: Permit me first of all to thank you, our host for your extraordinary arrangements and warm hospitality.
sentences.chinese: 首先，請允許我感謝主辦方的精心安排和盛情款待。

sentences.english: Kelsi: One more question. Do you have any advice for the host, our school?
sentences.chinese: 還有一個問題。您對主辦方或我們學校有什麼提議嗎？

sentences.english: The organizer put many valuable works of calligraphy, and paintings up for auction.
sentences.chinese: 這次拍賣會的主辦方會拿出多件珍貴的字畫參拍。

sentences.english: Keelung City also hosted a race at Bisha Fishing Port.
sentences.chinese: 基隆市也在碧砂漁港主辦了一場比賽。

sentences.english: The host city treasures the Olympic flag after it receives it.
sentences.chinese: 主辦城市接過奧運會會旗後都把它珍藏起來。

sentences.english: Since then it has held conferences biennially with sponsorship from host countries and other parties.
sentences.chinese: 自此，主辦國和其他人士每兩年便贊助舉行該會議。

sentences.english: The Gourmet Week is hosted by SAS Hotel and co-sponsored by the Chinese embassy in Latvia .
sentences.chinese: 美食周由薩斯飯店主辦，中國駐拉脫維亞大使館協辦。

sentences.english: This document shall be interpreted by the sponsor.
sentences.chinese: 本文件解釋權歸主辦單位。

sentences.english: Tokyo organizers have not said whether they plan to try again.
sentences.chinese: 東京主辦單位還沒有說他們是否打算再度嘗試。

sentences.english: China has finally won the 2010 shanghai shenbo bid.
sentences.chinese: 中國終於獲得了2010年上海申博的主辦權。

definition: to assist/to help sb do sth/to cooperate in doing sth
